page.title: 11INDOOR GAMES
page.content: Computers are the most popular indoor games. There are different games which are quite easy to run.The most popular games are Computers,Monopoly,Cluedo, Fast 111's,Chess and Scrabble. Comuters have been around for years. In the eighties more people have got their own computers. {MONOPOLY Monopoly has grown more popular.It consists of houses,places and money. Throw the dice,then move your counter. When you land on a space called "CHANCE",pick up the card and see what it says,do the same with communty chest.The winner is the one with the most property. {SCRABBLE Scrabble is popular with adults. You have to make words from letters.The words cross over each other.The winner is the one with the most points.
